name: Dallas
description: A beautiful apartment with lots of natural light, close to the university.
details: This sunny apartment is perfect for students who want a bright and comfortable living space with easy access to public transport and local amenities.

name: Kingsrow
description: A compact and affordable studio apartment for a single student.
details: A cozy studio located in a quiet neighborhood, perfect for female students who want privacy and peace.

name: Nassau
description: A large shared house with separate rooms available for rent.
details: A spacious shared house with fully furnished rooms and communal areas. Ideal for male students looking to save on rent.

name: Monaco
description: A stylish condo with modern amenities, perfect for young professionals.
details: A newly renovated condo with top-notch facilities, including a gym and swimming pool. Suitable for anyone looking for comfort and convenience.

name: San Marino
description: An affordable room in a shared apartment, close to campus.
details: A no-frills room for budget-conscious students, with easy access to campus facilities and public transportation.

name: Arebeng
description: A luxurious villa for those who want to live in style.
details: This luxury villa offers unparalleled comfort and privacy, with stunning views and high-end finishes. Ideal for those who want the best of student living.
